Ethical Culture Fieldston School history (6 folders)
Ethical Culture Fieldston School history (6 folders)

Primarily news clippings and copies of resources on the history of the schools, collected by the Alumni Affairs department. Includes information on school songs. Also includes a small amount of ephemera and correspondence from 1960s and 1970s.
